# Further reading

* Hilborn, R. & Mangel, M. The Ecological Detective. (Princeton University Press, Princeton, NJ, 2013). doi:10.1515/9781400847310.
  
* McElreath, R. Statistical Rethinking: A Bayesian Course with Examples in R and Stan. (Chapman and Hall/CRC, 2018).

* Bolker, B. M. Ecological Models and Data in R. (Princeton University Press, Princeton, NJ, 2008).

* Pearl, J., Glymour, M. & Jewell, N. P. Causal Inference in Statistics: A Primer. (John Wiley & Sons, 2016).
